mainHeading.title: Confirm you want to remove this goal

notes.label: Why do you want to remove this goal?

remove.pageBodyOne: Remove a goal if it is no longer relevant to {{ subject.givenName }}.
remove.pageBodyTwo: You will still be able to see it in 'Removed goals', but {{ subject.givenName }} will not be expected to achieve it.

page.errorTitle: Error: Confirm you want to delete this goal - {{ applicationName }}

mainHeading.title: Confirm you want to delete this goal

delete.pageBodyOne: Delete this goal if you've made a mistake. It will not be saved to {{ subject.possessiveName }} plan.
delete.pageBodyTwo: Alternatively, you can change the goal instead.
